xml.name: help
xml.help:
usage: cialign --infile INFILE [options]
Required Arguments: --infile INFILE path to input alignment file in FASTA format.
Basic Options: --inifile (string) Path to config file. Default: None. Parameters passed in the command line will take precedence over config file parameter. --outfile_stem (string) prefix for the output files. default is 'output' --all Use all available functions, with default parameters unless others are specified. Default: False --clean Use all cleaning functions, with default parameters unless others are specified. Default: False --visualise Plot all mini alignments, with default parameters unless others are specified. Default: False --interpret Use all interpretation functions, with default parameters unless others are specified. Default: False --silent Do not print progress to the screen. Default: False
Cleaning Functions:-
Remove divergent: --remove_divergent Remove sequences with <= remove_divergent_minperc positions at which the most common base/amino acid in the alignment is present
